sprunki-incredibox.title: Sprunki Incredibox
sprunki-incredibox.slogan: A Fan-Made Mod Inspired By Incredibox, Sprunki Incredibox
sprunki-incredibox.description: Sprunki Incredibox offers a fresh, vibrant experience that builds upon Incredibox while adding unique flair for music lovers.

HomeIframe.title: Sprunki Incredibox
HomeIframe.description: Experience the creativity of music-mixing with Sprunki Incredibox, now available online.

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Sprunki Incredibox is a fan-mod of the original game, taking music mixing to a new level with unique soundscapes and visuals.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Choose from a selection of new beats, effects, melodies, and voices.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Drag and drop your chosen sounds onto characters to start building your track.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Experiment with combinations to create your own unique music.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Enjoy fresh sound loops and rhythms for a wider variety of genres.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Distinctive characters and animations make Sprunki visually appealing.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Simple and fun interface accessible to all players.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Encourages endless experimentation for dynamic soundtracks.
